value.simple: .=val && val.description.toLowerCase().indexOf("port scan") > -1 ? "PortScan" : (val.description.toLowerCase().indexOf("rdp brute-force") > -1 ? "RDPBruteForce" : (val.description.toLowerCase().indexOf("first successful sso connection from a country in organization") > -1 ? "FirstSSOAccess" : (val.description.toLowerCase().indexOf("first sso access from asn in organization") > -1 ? "FirstSSOAccess" : (!val.file_artifacts || val.file_artifacts.length === 0 ? "XDR Incident" : "Malware"))))
